Can you be more specific on your issue ?
Which update do you try to distribute ?
What is the type of the main file ? Exe, Msi or Msp ?
What do you have set as "IsInstalled" rule, "IsInstallable" rule ?
Which status, computers report for this update ? Unknown, Not Installed, Installed or Not Applicable ?

Hi Dcourtel,

i have installed the msi (adobe flash player). this is for testing followed same steps which given in the doc.
Now package status showing as not installed.i have cross domain setup.
